author: Emre Peker
title: Trump Is Targeting 10% Cut in EU Steel, Aluminum Exports to U.S.
text:
BRUSSELS—President Donald Trump is weighing measures to cut European Union steel and aluminum exports to the U.S. by about 10%, in a sign the bloc’s concessions to secure tariff exemptions aren’t meeting White House demands, EU officials familiar with the talks said.
Washington proposed two options for Brussels: a quota fixed at 90% of U.S. imports from the EU in 2017 and a tariff-rate quota that would target the same 10% reduction via levies, Poland’s Entrepreneurship and Technology Minister Jadwiga Emilewicz said Tuesday after...
